paragraph.paragraph: Assembly folders, depicted by the common ../images/assembly/assembly.ico icon, match the ../../eiffelenvision_projects/structure/references/references_folder.xmlComponent References compiled into a project when last ../../compiling_projects/index.xmlBuilt. EiffelEnvision only will show the references from the last build because of the task of performing ../../../../../technologies/dotnet/eiffel_dotnet_language/20_language/90_assembly_formatting.xmlReferenced Assembly Type and Feature Name Conversion, done at compilation-time.

Expanding each assembly folders will yield a flat list of namespaces found in the corresponding assembly. Namespace, just like in the ms-help//MS.VSCC.2003/MS.MSDNQTR.2003FEB.1033/vsintro7/html/vxurfObjectBrowserS.htmVisual Studio .NET Object Browser, are denoted by the ../images/assembly/namespace.ico icon. In turn, expanding a namespace folder will yield a list of types.xml.NET Type Folder contained within the corresponding namespace.

link.label: Visual Studio .NET Class View and Object Browser Icons
